title: League of Legends Role play forum! (Nothing against the rules please.)
body: {{champion:432}}  Ever since they've put more work into lore, backgrounds, and story telling it's been making me itch to see if any body's role playing in the forums.{{summoner:31}}  If any body's interested just post any thing LoL related I guess and I'll join in or somebody could play as the scenario narrator /A.I XD{{champion:53}} Pro or nooby are welcome!{{champion:9}}
